articles.title: Agentic AI Takes Charge: When Machines Start Running the Show
articles.summary: In 2025, agentic AI will be the big tech story of the century. Companies like xAI and others are rolling out systems that act like mini-managers planning, tweaking, and getting stuff done. It's not about cutting people out, it's about letting them breathe while the AI sweats the small stuff.

articles.title: Shop Amazon Lightning deals for up to 57% off tire inflators, ear wax removal tools, more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Today's Amazon Lightning deals offer discounts of up to 57% off some of the most interesting and eclectic mix of products. Amazon Prime members get same-day, one-day and two-day delivery options on millions of products and new members can try one week of Amazon Prime benefits for just $1.99.

articles.summary: Today's Amazon Lightning deals offer discounts of up to 57% off some of the most interesting and eclectic mix of products. Amazon Prime members get same-day, one-day and two-day delivery options on millions of products and new members can try one week of Amazon Prime benefits for just $1.99.

articles.title: Shop Amazon Lightning deals for up to 57% off tire inflators, ear wax removal tools, more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Today's Amazon Lightning deals offer discounts of up to 57% on a limited number of products for a very limited time only. USA TODAY Shopping highlights some of the most interesting and eclectic mix of discounts. Amazon Prime members get same-day, one-day and two-day delivery options on millions of products.

articles.title: Shop Amazon Lightning deals for up to 57% off tire inflators, ear wax removal tools, more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: USA TODAY Shopping readers can save money on products from Amazon's Lightning deals. Amazon Lightning deals are promoted on the Today's Deals section on the Amazon homepage. An Amazon Lightning deal is an Amazon promotion with a limited number of discounts available on a specific item for a short period of time.

articles.title: Shop Amazon Lightning deals for up to 57% off tire inflators, ear wax removal tools, more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Today's Amazon Lightning deals feature some of the most eclectic mix of discounts. They include an ear wax removal tool, a TikTok-famous skincare wand, a retractable garden hose, a portable tire inflator and a stand up paddle board for summer.

articles.title: AI插圖名稱:橫式透明智慧型手機螢幕顯示一盤閃電泡芙.檸檬鬆餅.藍莓塔.氣泡檸檬水.－AI芯視界｜痞客邦
articles.author: Ai芯視界
articles.summary: AI has created a transparent smartphone screen with a picture of a plate of éclairs, lemon muffins, and blueberry tarts, a glass of sparkling lemonade, and the time displayed on the phone is 8:30. The background is filled with tiny particles of color and wisps of smoke.

articles.title: A Softer Humanoid Robot for the Home
articles.author: Jesse Orrall
articles.summary: Robotics company 1X has released a video of its new robot, Neo Gamma, doing various tasks in a home setting. This demo said nothing about how the robot was being controlled. However, the company has shown videos of its Eve robots working autonomously and performing various tasks.

articles.title: Turing AI and 'bulletproof' EV batteries arrive with 2025 Xpeng G6 SUV
articles.author: Jo Borrás
articles.summary: Xpeng G6 all-electric SUV has received a raft of updates for the 2025 model year. The new model has a new, bulletproof 5C charging 'A.I. battery that can go from 10 to 80% full in 12 minutes. The G6 starts at 176,800 yuan ($27,620) but is 11% cheaper than last year's model. It took Xpeng 7 minutes to order 5,000 cars on the first day of availability.

articles.title: New Era and MLB Release the 'Sakura Pack' Collection
articles.summary: The New Era x MLB 'Sakura Pack' is available now in Japan. MLB is in the middle of its 'Tokyo Series,' a four-game set that saw the Yankees and the Dodgers play four games each. Stay tuned for info on a potential global release date.

articles.title: 43 Things For Cleaning And Organizing Your Home If You're The Type Of Person Who, Well, Hates Chores
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Wet & Forget shower cleaner is a handy tool for cleaning the bathroom. Honeycomb drawer insert is an organization tool for sock, bra, and underwear drawers. An overnight tank cleaner can remove the gunk from the toilet tank overnight and clean it in the morning.

articles.title: 32 'Travel' Versions Of Products You'll Wanna Buy And Then Keep In Your Suitcase For Your Next Trip
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Packing for your next getaway is going to be easier. I Dew Care "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo is easy to take to the bathroom toward the end of a red-eye so you can deboard feeling fresher. SlumberPod is a small business that's been featured on Shark Tank. Ronald recommends DDS, which specializes in toothbrushes.

articles.title: Mind your manners, diners, restaurants are turning the tables on grumpy reviewers
articles.author: Kate Maltby
articles.summary: Two months after buying a new duvet cover, she still hasn't left a review on the company website. Incessant demands for consumer feedback are the newest plague on our inboxes. Tripadvisor is still badgering her to review a restaurant she didn't attend. Dorian, the Notting Hill restaurant is tearing up the rulebook on customer feedback.

articles.title: 30 Products That'll Help Get Your Outdoor Space Into Shape After The Hellscape That Was Winter
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The pressure washer with five nozzles and a stain-busting exterior spray are among the products we recommend. Grampa's Weeder is a family-owned small business that's home to a standing weeder design that's been around since 1913.

articles.title: An Ode to The Bull City Reddit
articles.author: Sofie Buckminster
articles.summary: Bull City Reddit has 74,000 members and 14 years under its belt. It's a place where Durham residents seek recommendations, air grievances, and celebrate the little things. The forum's contributors range from doctors to entrepreneurs to stay-at-home moms. It ranks in the top 2% of largest subreddit.

articles.title: Polestar's new SUV is a tech marvel – but is it worth the price tag?
articles.author: Tony Davis
articles.summary: Testing a new car each week in 2025 is a bit like being handed one new smartphone after another with a different operating system. All the things you were close to mastering over the past week are thrown out the window and replaced with a new set of menus, controls, protocols, shortcuts and app capabilities.

articles.title: Baidu launches AI model that rivals DeepSeek in performance and cost
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Baidu released a new artificial intelligence reasoning model yesterday and made its AI chatbot services free to consumers. Technology companies in China have been enhancing their AI capabilities in understanding, planning, reflection, and evolution to compete with the US and other tech giants.

articles.title: Home robot automates household chores like Rosie from 'The Jetsons'
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: NEO Gamma is a 65-inch-tall robot with human-like movements and an AI-driven conversation. It walks with a natural gait, swings its arms and can even squat to pick things up. It aims to blend seamlessly into your life, offering assistance without being intrusive.

articles.title: AYANEO's next flagship gaming handheld is coming soon
articles.author: Andrew Myrick
articles.summary: The AYANEO Pocket S2 will make its debut on March 17 at the Game Developers Conference (GDC). It will be powered by the same Snapdragon G3x Gen 2 chip as the original Pocket S. It's only been six months since the Pocket EVO was released. It starts at $589 for the base model.

articles.title: Amazon's Rufus AI Chat Is More Useful Than I Realized
articles.author: Saikat Basu
articles.summary: Rufus is Amazon's AI-powered shopping assistant. It's trained on product listings, reviews and Q&As to give you the answers to your shopping questions. Rufus has issues with nuance, but it's useful for narrow research and troubleshooting problems.

articles.title: MTN unveils Go Make a Difference campaign in Benin
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria has launched a Go Make a Difference (Go M.A.D) campaign to empower Nigerians to make a difference in every area of their lives using MTN data. Mr Olaniyi Alabi, Senior Manager, Edo Business Unit, MTN, said the campaign is MTN's latest.

articles.title: Tech frenzy! Jumia unleashes unbeatable deals for Tech Week 2025
articles.author: Published By: Kazeem Ugbodaga
articles.summary: Jumia has officially kicked off its highly anticipated Tech Week 2025, a game-changing event offering consumers massive discounts on the latest gadgets and smart devices. The campaign features strategic partnerships with top brands, including Xiaomi, Oraimo, Binatone, Itel, SilverCrest, Ecoflow, Tecno, Realme, Skyrun, Century Appliances, Hisense, PZ Cussons, Unilever, and Nivea.

articles.title: Dutch startup Skylark takes off to give non-technical founders wings
articles.author: Thomas Macaulay
articles.summary: Skylark is a startup that helps founders create Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) using an AI-enhanced framework. Freelance developers apply the framework to build the MVPs, while Skylark's internal team handles the client acquisition. Every solution is customised for the founder's objectives.

articles.title: MTN unveils ‘Go Make a Difference' campaign in Benin
articles.author: NAN
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria has launched a 'Go Make a Difference' (Go M.A.D) campaign to empower Nigerians to make a difference in every area of their lives using MTN data. Mr Olaniyi Alabi, Senior Manager, Edo Business Unit, MTN said MTN is committed to progress and empowering its customers.

articles.title: Baidu launches two new versions of its AI model Ernie
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Baidu has launched two new AI models. Ernie 4.5 is the latest version of the company's foundational model first released two years ago and Ernie X1 is a new reasoning model. Baidu claims that Ernie x1's performance is on par with DeepSeek R1 at half the price.

articles.title: 'So did he walk there?': Nissan Sentra driver goes to Walmart for an oil change. Then the auto care worker asks him to pull in
articles.author: Rebekah Harding
articles.summary: Skylouieeeee, an auto care worker at Walmart, says a Nissan Sentra driver overcomplicated the process by not telling him where the car is. The driver is angry because he doesn't want the workers to start changing the oil 'right now' until he gets his car.

articles.title: Baidu Unveils ERNIE 4.5 and Reasoning Model ERNIE X1, Makes ERNIE Bot Free Ahead of Schedule  Mar. 16, 2025 16:36
articles.summary: ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1 are Baidu's new foundation models for AI. Both models are free to individual users. They are available for input and output at prices starting as low as RMB 0.004 per thousand tokens and RMB0.016 per thousand token. For enterprise users and developers, ERnIE is now accessible via APIs on BaidU AI Cloud's MaaS platform Qianfan. ERnie X1 will be available on the platform soon.

articles.title: I tried the "world's most secure VPN" and while it's not the VPN you'll want, you'll need it sooner than you think
articles.author: Rob Dunne
articles.summary: NymVPN launched in London last night. It's main aim is to provide total online privacy and security to those who need it most. Nym mixnet routes all online requests through five nodes to jumble your traffic and other users' traffic, so your online activity can't be directly routed back to you. Fast Mode runs as a traditional multi-hop WireGuard connection, but uses AmneziaWG, an obfuscated, WireGuard solution.

articles.title: Danyl McLauchlan: Adrian Orr's vanishing act
articles.author: Danyl McLauchlan
articles.summary: Advertise with New ZealandME.com.uk. NZME.uk is a service of New Zealand Media Exchange.    New Media Exchange is a division of Media Exchange International, which offers services to the Media Exchange Marketer. New Media Marketer is based in New Zealand.

articles.title: Close out your tabs—shop today's 10 most popular sales right here
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Stanley Quencher Tumblers are on sale for as little as $15 today. DreamCloud mattress spring sale has up to 50% off mattresses and $599 of bedding accessories included for free this March. Dream Cloud is on sale until March 31st.

articles.title: Supermodel Heidi Klum, 51, doesn't wash her face with cleanser and instead swears by £2 BABY product for ageless skin
articles.author: Senior Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Heidi Klum, 51, has an estimated net worth of over £30 million. She doesn't use a facial cleanser or toner to clean her face. She uses Johnson's Baby Shampoo Without Dyes Sulphates & Soap for £2. Once a week, she uses St. Ives Apricot Scrub to exfoliate the dead skin. She also uses Augustinus Bader Face Oil and Rich Cream.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 games line-up will have something for everybody based on exciting leak
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: FuturLab recently announced PowerWash Simulator 2 for PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC in 2025. Eurogamer confirmed that the game will be released for Nintendo Switch 2. FuturLab claims the reports were premature and that there are currently no firm plans for a Switch 2 port.

articles.title: Lidl drops handy gadget that's £100 cheaper than Karcher & perfect for cleaning patios & getting gardens spring ready
articles.author: Engagement Editor
articles.summary: Lidl is selling the Parkside Pressure Washer for £39.99. It's £120 cheaper than rival Kärcher's pressure washer. The product will be available in stores from next Thursday on March 20. Lidl will be offering a wide selection of Parkside products from March 16 to cater for all DIY needs.

articles.title: Lidl drops handy gadget that's £100 cheaper than Karcher & perfect for cleaning patios & getting gardens spring ready
articles.author: Chloe Sharp
articles.summary: Lidl is selling the Parkside Pressure Washer for £39.99. The gadget is £120 cheaper than rival Kärcher's High pressure washer K 2 Classic. The product will be available in stores from next Thursday on March 20. Lidl will be offering a range of Parkside products from March 16.

articles.title: Want to buy Canadian...on Amazon Prime? Check out Amazon's newly launched Canada Showcase
articles.author: Katherine Caspersz
articles.summary: Amazon Canada launched a Canada Showcase with curated selection of items crafted right here in Canada. The showcase highlights the best of Canadian craftsmanship and design. There are categories to shop from: Grocery and gourmet food, Home and kitchen, Clothing, shoes and accessories, Health and personal care, Pet supplies, Toys, books and music, Office supplies.

articles.title: A Humanoid Robot Made for Your Home video
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Robotics company 1X recently revealed its NEO Gamma robot, a humanoid clothed in soft 3D-printed nylon fabric and designed for use in the home. 1X's robot is made of soft, 3D printed nylon fabric, and it can be controlled via a smartphone app.

articles.title: A Softer Humanoid Robot for the Home
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Robotics company 1X recently revealed its NEO Gamma robot, a humanoid clothed in soft 3D-printed nylon fabric and designed for use in the home. 1X's robot is made of soft, 3D printed nylon fabric, and it can be controlled via a smartphone app.

articles.title: China's Baidu launches two AI models amid rising competition
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Baidu has launched two new AI models, including a reasoning-focused model that it said rivalled DeepSeek's model. Baidu vies to stand out in a fiercely competitive AI race.ERNIE X1 delivers performance on par with Deepseek R1 at only half the price.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 could be in big trouble as new leak suggests serious competition
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: New reports suggest Microsoft could launch an Xbox-branded handheld in 2025. The handheld will run on a Windows operating system. Microsoft is also said to be working on a next-gen Xbox console, which could speed up Sony's plans to launch PS6. Nintendo is expected to launch the Switch 2 this summer.

articles.title: Morgan Supersport hits 166 mph speed with BMW engine, classic design
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Morgan has officially launched the Supersport, its highly anticipated new flagship model. It marks a significant evolution from the outgoing Plus Six and balances the brand's iconic design language with contemporary advancements. It aims to deliver an enhanced driving experience while retaining the quintessential Morgan character.

articles.title: With Manus, AI experimentation has burst into the open
articles.author: Economist
articles.summary: Manus AI agent is a system built on top of existing models that can interact with the internet and perform a sequence of tasks without deferring to a human user for permission. Its makers, who are based in China, claim to have built the world's first general AI agent that 'turns your thoughts into actions'. Ai labs around the world have been experimenting with this 'agentic' approach in private. Big labs have been cautious about agentic ai.

articles.title: This dryer vent cleaner clears out a terrifying amount of lint — on sale for $10
articles.summary: The Sealegend Dryer Vent Cleaner Kit costs $10 on Amazon. It's the No. 1 bestselling gadget with over 17,000 five-star reviews. It comes with a hose, an adapter and a guide wire to remove dryer lint from the vent.

articles.title: High-Tech Car Features That Prove They Aren't Just Marketing Gimmicks
articles.author: Andre Nalin
articles.summary: Modern cars are packed with high-tech features, but some of them are gimmicks that look good on a spec sheet, while others can make driving safer, easier, and more enjoyable. We combed through discussions with car enthusiasts, daily drivers, and normal people like you and me to see which features people actually use and appreciate.

articles.title: Does your smartphone speed carry the weight it used to?
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Smartphone processors are getting faster, but there seem to be diminishing returns. The jump from an iPhone 6s to the iPhone XR was huge, but I was surprised at how small the performance bump was on the iPhone 13. For the apps that count on a daily basis, speed is often no longer a concern. Most people limit their phone gaming to 2D titles like Candy Crush or Words With Friends. More graphically intense console games are beginning to appear on mobile, such as Resident Evil: Village. AI hasn't inflated smartphone sales so far, and there's been a bit of a backlash against it.

articles.title: Blue Light Card extends to teachers
articles.author: 2 minute read
articles.summary: Martin Lewis encourages teachers to sign up to Blue Light Card. The card is a discount service for the emergency services, NHS, social care sector and armed forces. It costs £4.99 for two years' access to 15,000+ discounts from major retailers and local businesses.

articles.title: These 12 trending Amazon products tackle life's little problems — starting at $13
articles.summary: Thanks to Amazon, we have access to countless reviews from shoppers. Some of their favorite products are on sale. If you have Amazon Prime, you'll get free shipping, but not yet a member? You can sign up for your free 30-day trial here.

articles.title: Popular outdoor brand shares Chapter 11 bankruptcy warning
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Just having a single successful product has not hindered many brands. GoPro is a one-trick pony and Crocs essentially only sells one variation of the same thing. The investors on the "Shark Tank" panel pass on an offer because they see it as a product not a brand.

articles.title: Unpacking The Voice Assumptions That Are Holding Back Many CX Efforts
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Many brands are hindered by preconceived notions about how to communicate with their customers, especially younger customers. It's time to challenge those beliefs and create new ways to reach out to customers.   .      for more information, go to: www.justgiving.com/how-to-communicate-with-customers.

articles.title: What the suds? One man's laundry hack sparks discourse over detergent measuring cup
articles.author: Amaris Encinas
articles.summary: A TikTok video of a man's laundry hack sparks discourse over detergent measuring cup. Australian woman made a video documenting her partner's weird behavior online. Many people agree with the man's behavior, while others think it's not so weird because they do the same thing.

articles.title: A Softer Humanoid Robot for the Home
articles.author: Jesse Orrall
articles.summary: 1X has released a video of its new robot, Neo Gamma, doing various home-related tasks. The company has shown videos of its Eve robots working autonomously and performing various tasks. Neo Gamma's suit and shoes are 3D-printed nylon and feature a minimalist design to fit easier into the home.

articles.title: 10 Cool New Gadgets to Keep on Your Radar
articles.author: Tbowe
articles.summary: Catching you up on the past week's most notable product releases. JBL announced next-gen versions of its portable Bluetooth speakers, TCL revealed an affordable alternative to an OLED TV, and Fluance debuted its powered speaker systems in the last week.

articles.title: Why Buying Smartphone from Showcase can be a bad idea: 6 good reasons have been named
articles.author: Natasha Kumar
articles.summary: Many stores offer customers the opportunity to buy a window smartphone at a reduced price. Before buying a smartphone from a showcase it is worth considering all the risks. The window smartphones are usually connected to the power supply and work continuously for months. There is a limited guarantee for window models, which can be only 1-2 months. The showcase samples are sold without a box, charger or other accessories.

articles.title: Virgin Media is handing out free iPads and there's a simple way to claim yours now
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Virgin Media has launched a new deal that gives you a free iPad for signing up for one of its plans. The model that will arrive in the post is the older 9th Gen iPad with a 10.2-inch screen, A13 Bionic processor, Touch ID fingerprint scanner and a single rear camera. The Mega Volt Bundle includes 1Gbps broadband, Sky Cinema and Sports, over 230 TV channels, Talk Anytime, Free Unlimited O2 SIM and a free setup fee. It costs £88.99 per month.

articles.title: Tyson Ventures calls startups to apply for Tyson Demo Day 2025
articles.summary: Tyson Ventures, the venture capital arm of Tyson Foods, has announced the call for applications for the fourth annual Tyson Demo Day. This year's event will take place on July 9, 2025, in-person in Northwest Arkansas. It will focus on advancing artificial intelligence in food technology, emphasizing consumer and customer brand engagement, innovation in research and development, and reimagining product development processes.

articles.title: Baidu Unveils Free AI Models to Spar with DeepSeek in AI Industry Battle
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Baidu recently launched ERNIE X1 and 4.5 AI models for free. Elias Vance is a tech analyst at Quantum Leap Analytics. He explains the implications of Baidu's new AI products for the development and adoption of AI applications in various industries.

articles.title: The £12 lipstick that'll get you loads of compliments – it gives you fuller lips & lasts all day
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Today is National Lips Day. Wearing red lipstick can make you look younger. Lipsticks from high-end brands like YSL and Prada are expensive. Fabulous's Senior Writer YASMIN HARISHA has found affordable alternatives that do just as good a job as their luxury counterparts.

articles.title: Home robot automates household chores like Rosie from 'The Jetsons'
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: NEO Gamma is an artificial intelligence robot designed by the company 1X. It's 65 inches tall and features AI-driven conversation, human-like movements and the ability to manipulate objects with dexterity. It has four microphones with echo cancellation for clear audio and three speakers for voice interaction and sound effects.

articles.title: 'Wow' Mark & Spencer', 'Fabulous' Next and 'flattering' New Look shirt dresses for curves
articles.author: Jayne Thomson
articles.summary: A shirt dress is comfortable, can be worn casually or dressed up with a pair of heels and flattering on curves. Marks & Spencer has a great shirt dress, that's highly rated, but there are limited sizes available online. Next's cream dress is popular on its website as one shopper commented that they had lots of 'compliments' while wearing it.

articles.title: 31 'Most Wished For' Products From Amazon You'll Soon Be Wishing For, Too
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: A set of Beckham Hotel Collection pillows. The Pink Stuff, a TikTok-famous cleaning product. Levi's high-rise, straight-cut ankle jeans. Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch for acne. Kindle Paperwhite. Libby app. Baby Shusher.

articles.title: Israeli military kills two Hezbollah terrorists
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: According to CNN.com, the number of women in the U.S. is at an all-time high. It is estimated at more than half a billion people. The number is estimated to be approaching 60 million people. It's estimated to reach 70 million by the year's end.

articles.title: Can't Stand Dirt And Grime? These 28 Products Will Make It Magically Vanish
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: A MagicFiber microfiber cleaning cloth, Purple Power Industrial Strength Degreaser, Pink Magic shoe cleaner, and Folex stain remover are some of the products recommended by experts for cleaning things around the house and car. They are effective and effective without harsh chemicals.

articles.title: Baidu Unveils ERNIE 4.5 and Reasoning Model ERNIE X1, Makes ERNIE Bot Free Ahead of Schedule
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1 are Baidu's new generation native multimodal foundation models. They offer advanced capabilities at a more accessible price point. They are available to enterprise users and developers via API on MaaS platform Qianfan platform. ERNie Bot is being made free to the public ahead of schedule.

articles.title: The hype around AI agent Manus doesn't represent a second DeepSeek moment, but reveals that Chinese startups can compete with AI product companies in the US (Catherine Thorbecke/Bloomberg)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: The viral AI agent Manus from a Chinese startup isn't about research breakthroughs, it's about creating competitive consumer products. Chinese startups can compete with AI product companies in the US, according to Catherine Thorbecke of Bloomberg. She adds that Manus is not a second DeepSeek moment.

articles.title: Mind your manners, diners, restaurants are turning the tables on grumpy reviewers
articles.author: Kate Maltby
articles.summary: Incessant demands for consumer feedback are the newest plague on our inboxes. Businesses are reduced to begging customers for online reviews. In Notting Hill restaurant Dorian, owner Chris D'Sylva keeps a logbook of diners' behaviour.

articles.title: Baidu releases free AI model to compete with DeepSeek
articles.author: Hürriyet Daily News
articles.summary: Chinese internet search giant Baidu has released a new artificial intelligence. Baidus released the artificial intelligence on Monday.      Â. Â   in Chinese.  in English.  In English  in Russian   In Chinese.

articles.summary: ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1 are Baidu's new foundation models for AI. Both models are freely accessible to individual users through ERnIE Bot's official website. For enterprise users and developers, ERnie is now accessible via APIs on BaidU AI Cloud's MaaS platform Qianfan. ERNie X1 is set to be available on the platform soon.

articles.title: Baidu Unveils ERNIE 4.5 and Reasoning Model ERNIE X1, Makes ERNIE Bot Free Ahead of Schedule
articles.author: Baidu
articles.summary: ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1 are free to use on Baidu's official website. They are native multimodal foundation models and deep-thinking reasoning models. The input and output prices start as low as RMB 0.004 per thousand tokens.

articles.title: Oopsy — These 32 Products From Amazon's 'Movers & Shakers' Section Are Gonna Slink Their Way Right Into Your Cart
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream is loaded with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Cosrx's snail mucin repairing essence helps heal acne, inflammation, peeling, fine lines, and even eczema. The Owala Travel Tumbler has a 2-1 spout and a cup-holder-friendly design.

articles.title: Turbo scrubbing brush 'great for cleaning tiles and grout' now £10 off
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: The Voom Turbo Scrubbing Brush is on sale on Yimbly for £29.99. It's cheaper than B&Q's Waterproof Cordless Electric Cleaning Brush Scrubber for £39.99, but all customers have rated it five stars.

articles.title: We tried five supermarket crunchy peanut butters and two were clear winners
articles.author: David Roy
articles.summary: We tried five supermarket own brand instant coffees and found them to be the best and the worst in a taste test of peanut butter. The winner of the test was the Tesco's Crunchy Peanut Butter, which costs £1.10 per 100g. The loser was the Lidl Maribel Crunchy peanut butter, which cost 32p.

articles.title: SafeOpt by AddShpppers Named a G2 2025 Best Software Award Winner
articles.author: Add Shoppers
articles.summary: SafeOpt has been named one of G2's Best Software Products. The award is based on verified user reviews and publicly available market presence data. SafeOpt's inclusion is a testament to the positive impact they've had on their clients and the results they've shared.

articles.title: China's Baidu releases new AI model to compete with DeepSeek
articles.author: ADEK BERRY
articles.summary: Baidu released a new artificial intelligence reasoning model Sunday and made its AI chatbot services free to consumers. Technology companies in China have been scrambling to release improved AI platforms since start-up DeepSeek shocked its rivals with its open source and highly cost-efficient model in January.

Technology companies in China have been scrambling to release improved AI platforms since start-up DeepSeek shocked its rivals with its open source and highly cost-efficient model in January.

articles.summary: Chinese internet search giant Baidu has released a new artificial intelligence reasoning model and made its AI chatbot services free. It is part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange (BLOXDX).      Â   - Ed.

articles.title: New Honda Car Launch
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Honda has once again captured the automotive world's attention by unveiling its latest innovation, the all-new Honda Elevate, a contemporary SUV. The Elevate is a new, contemporary SUV that is available in both manual and automatic transmissions. It is available now.

articles.title: ‘I hate dry shampoos but this £20 scalp-friendly mist leaves my hair instantly refreshed'
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Straand's Crown Refresh Revitalising Dry Shampoo Mist, £20, is an Aussie-made haircare brand that claims their products are'skincare for your scalp'. Straand's dry shampoo comes out in a wet mist consistency and requires you to completely saturate your roots and hair before blow-drying.

articles.title: 25 Target Skincare Products For Anyone Who Loves When Things Exceed Their Expectations
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: Some of the products were sent as samples by BuzzFeed's editors. They recommend a cleansing oil with coconut oil and argan oil, a hyaluronic acid serum, an alcohol-free toner, an under-eye cream to help brighten and firm your undereye after too many hours of late-night TV watching, and a caffeine cream.

articles.title: China's Baidu releases new, free AI model to compete with DeepSeek
articles.author: AFP AFP
articles.summary: Baidu released a new artificial intelligence reasoning model Sunday and made its AI chatbot services free. Technology companies in China have been scrambling to release improved AI platforms since start-up DeepSeek shocked its rivals with its open source and highly cost-efficient model in January.

articles.title: How terrifying ordeal led to booming business
articles.summary: Nicole Tomasek and Nicola Nikolaidis have been best friends for more than a decade. They have created a hair growth serum called SO'L THIC under the brand name By NIKŌL. It is a thickening serum that promotes hair health and growth and provides SPF for the scalp.

articles.title: These 31 Products Have Impressive Results…Which Is Even More Impressive When You See How Things Started
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Some products were sent as samples by BuzzFeed and were independently selected by our editors. BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page. They recommend a screen-cleaning brush, a slicker brush and a pack of carborundum sponges.

articles.title: ‘Stylish and easy' coffee machine with espresso that 'taste so good' down by 21%
articles.author: Joanne Ridout Property Editor
articles.summary: The Nespresso 11315 Citiz Coffee Machine in black has been reduced on Amazon by 21% from £175 to £139 for a limited time. The machine has over 2,000 five-star customer ratings. It's easy to use and makes great espresso coffee in seconds. The De'Longhi EC230 Espresso Coffee Machine from Argos costs £105.00 and the Philips L'Or Coffee Machine is £119.00 from John Lewis.

articles.title: By NIKŌL: Nicole Tomasek and Nicola Nikolaidis turn terrifying experiences with scalp melanoma into a business
articles.author: Holly Truelove
articles.summary: Nicole Tomasek and Nicola Nikolaidis have been best friends for more than a decade. They both have a personal connection to scalp melanoma. They created a product called SO'L THIC, which promotes hair health and growth and provides SPF for the scalp. The product is cruelty-free and vegan and uses natural ingredients.
